estimated_metrics.note: Model shows severe miscalibration with high sensitivity (78%) but catastrophic specificity (15%). Over-predicting glaucoma class.

cross_eval_discrepancy.interpretation: Severe overfitting to validation fold. Cross-eval shows true generalization is worse.

recommendation: HALT - Model is severely miscalibrated and shows catastrophic RIM-ONE performance (AUC 0.47 vs 0.78 baseline)
